verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have found You faithful, Oh Lord,
Faithful unto me.
I have found You faithful, Oh King,
Complete this work, this work in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My heart is fixed, Oh Lord. I will praise Thee.
My mind is set, Oh Lord, to give Thee thanks.
No matter how You deal, we see You faithful,
For we are holding fast to Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thy loving kindness, Lord, reached the heavens,
And now it reaches where we stand.
And though You give, and choose to take away,
We will not cease to bless your name.
